verses.verse: He that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> place of the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> Shall <S%H3885>abide<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>.
I will <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, He is my <S%H4268>refuge<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>; My <S%H430>God<s%>, in whom I <S%H982>trust<s%>.
For he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee from the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler<s%>, And from the <S%H1942>deadly<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>.

He will <S%H5526>cover<s%> thee with his <S%H84>pinions<s%>, And under his <S%H3671>wings<s%> shalt thou take <S%H2620>refuge<s%>: His <S%H571>truth<s%> is a <S%H6793>shield<s%> and a <S%H5507>buckler<s%>.
Thou shalt not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> for the <S%H6343>terror<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, Nor for the <S%H2671>arrow<s%> that <S%H5774>flieth<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>;
For the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> in <S%H652>darkness<s%>, Nor for the <S%H6986>destruction<s%> that <S%H7736>wasteth<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%>.
A thousand shall fall at thy side, And ten thousand at thy right hand; But it shall not come nigh thee.
Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold, And see the reward of the wicked.
For thou, O Jehovah, art my refuge! Thou hast made the Most High thy habitation;
There shall no evil befall thee, Neither shall any plague come nigh thy tent.
For he will give his angels charge over thee, To keep thee in all thy ways.
They shall bear thee up in their hands, Lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.
Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: The young lion and the serpent shalt thou trample under foot.
Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
He shall call upon me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble: I will deliver him, and honor him.
With long life will I satisfy him, And show him my salvation.
